org.eventchain.hlc

Class HybridTimestamp

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eventchain.hlc.HybridTimestamp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<HybridTimestamp>

    public class HybridTimestamp
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<HybridTimestamp>
    HybridTimestamp implements Hybrid Logical Clock, currently heavily inspired by a corresponding Rust library.
